Question
========

(i) 4 groups with 8 observations each and (ii) 3 groups with 11 observations each? observations? 
Answerlist
----------
* (i) 2.71 and (ii) 2.92
* (i) 2.71 and (ii) 3.32
* (i) 2.95 and (ii) 2.92
* (i) 2.95 and (ii) 3.32

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
